<<<<<<< HEAD
The duty and comfort of suffering subiects. Represented by Peter Talbot in a letter to the Roman-Catholiks of Ireland, particulary those of the city and diocese of Dublin Talbot, Peter, 1620-1680.
2, 7-16 p.
s.n., [Douai : 1674]
Caption title. Wing gives place of publication as Douay; at end of text: Paris May the 2d 1674. Copy cropped, affecting text. Imperfect: pp. 3-6 lacking. Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
=======
